text: 😱 Did you know that more than 100 million Americans have medical debt? 💸🤯 It's true! And it's not just those without health insurance. 🤔 Even those with high-deductible health plans are struggling to pay their medical bills. 😩 In fact, a third of people with these plans are in medical debt, and many are having trouble affording basic needs like food and housing. 🍔🏠 It's unacceptable that medical costs are putting Americans in financial crisis. 💸🤯 We need to do better!
